title: As a user, I want to add locations as favorites and toggle between them quickly accessible.
body:
## Role:
User
## Functionality:
- Add locations as favorites
- Toggle between them
## Benefit:
Quick access to weather information of several locations
## Conversation:
N/A
## Confirmation:
N/A
## Origin/Source:
http://www.link-to.origin.com/id/4711
